at.ac.acdh.concept_mapping

Class CMDI2CIDOCMap.Link

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.acdh.concept_mapping.CMDI2CIDOCMap.Link
  • Enclosing class:
    CMDI2CIDOCMap

    public static class CMDI2CIDOCMap.Link
extends java.lang.Object

    Link class connects CLARIN CMDI elements with CIDOC-CRM ontology. It uses same elements as CLARIN mapping between concepts and facets such as patterns, concepts and blacklistPatterns

    Author:
    dostojic

      • getEntities

        public java.util.Collection<CMDI2CIDOCMap.ParthenosEntity> getEntities()

        In case of multiple entities, intermediate nodes are created. In that case original order is preserved.

        Returns:
        list of CMDI2CIDOCMap.ParthenosEntity

      • setEntities

        public void setEntities(java.util.Collection<CMDI2CIDOCMap.ParthenosEntity> entities)

      • getConcepts

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getConcepts()
        Returns:
        list of specified CLARIN concepts

        Concepts will be "translated" to xpaths for each profile. One concept can be "translated" to many xpaths.

      • setConcepts

        public void setConcepts(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> concepts)

      • getPatterns

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getPatterns()

        For each pattern one link will be created.

        Returns:
        list of specified xpaths in CLARIN profiles
        See Also:
        gr.forth.x3ml.X3ML.Mappings.Mapping.Link.Range

      • getBlacklistPatterns

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getBlacklistPatterns()

        Patterns derived from concepts, that are specified in blacklist will be removed from further translation into x3ml classes

        Returns:
        blacklist of xpaths
